quest.name: A Fertile Blend
journal:
Stigma-4 requires someone capable of great speed.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested goods to Stigma-4.
objectives: Mine [Error] in Ostrakon Deka-okto.Deliver [Error] to Stigma-4.Gather [Error] south of the vitrified fort.Catch [Error] in the abode of the Ea.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Commencing regularly scheduled analysis of Karellian agricultural endeavors. You are requested to stand by while process completes and your task is assigned...

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: <ping> Analysis concludes that improvements to Karellian fertilizer by means of alien matter may result in higher crop yields. For this task, we require the aid of the most efficient errand organism in the immediate vicinity: you.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Obtain nutrient-rich ore from Ostrakon Deka-okto. Approximate coordinates: 9, 33, 0. Consider this mission to be top priority.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Obtain carpet-like grass from the vitrified fort. Approximate coordinates: 22, 35, 0. Consider this mission to be top priority.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Obtain tiny aquatic organisms from the abode of the Ea. Approximate coordinates: 22, 7, 2. Use gold salmon roe as bait for the highest probability of success. Consider this mission to be top priority.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Rest is not the recommended state of motion for this mission. Travel to Ostrakon Deka-okto and return with nutrient-rich ore.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Rest is not the recommended state of motion for this mission. Travel to the vitrified fort and return with carpet-like grass.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Rest is not the recommended state of motion for this mission. Travel to the abode of the Ea and return with tiny aquatic organisms. The use of gold salmon roe as bait will provide efficient and successful results.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Return of allied errand organism confirmed well within acceptable time frame. Assuming it has brought the requested materials.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Analyzing delivery... Fertilizer created with the incorporation of these materials is projected to improve agricultural yield by approximately 14.2%.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Fertilizer preparation, application to fields, and retrieval of increased harvest is predicted to require a 23.6% increase in Karellian labor time. Overwork deemed an acceptable compromise.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Your conduct in this mission deserves high commendation. Receive your compensation with pride.
